title: Can the government ban TikTok?
description:
How the Trump administration could ban the popular social media app and the consequences for its users.
Featuring:
Palmer Haasch (@haasch_palmer)
Adi Robertson (@thedextriarchy)

Links:
TikTok creators are worried about losing their followings as the Trump administration considers banning the app
How the Trump administration could ‘ban’ TikTok

Host:
Allegra Frank (@LegsFrank), guest host of Reset
About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
